summary: This document consists of official count slips and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 9-10, 2019. It records inmate population counts by housing unit and includes a roster showing inmates on suicide watch, coinciding with the period of Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and death.

events.title: Inmate Count and Roster at MCC
events.description: Administrative count of inmates and roster preparation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, showing specific housing unit populations and inmates on suicide watch.

events.title: Official Prison Count
events.description: Bureau of Prisons count sheet conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, recording a total inmate population of 758.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: The documents are official prison administrative records from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated August 9-10, 2019.
An inmate roster from August 9, 2019, lists four inmates with 'SUICIDE' in their assignment/operation category description.
A Bureau of Prisons count sheet from August 10, 2019, records a total inmate population of 758 at the MCC.
The dates of these records coincide with the period of Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and his death on August 10, 2019.
The documents are standard prison forms for tracking inmate location, status, and population counts.
